comment:
Drammers Club online pour. Nice balance between sherry malt and campbeltown funk. 


Nose: Raisins, Plums, Toffee, Chocolate, Gas, Rubber, Cherries, Dates, Smoke, Pepper, Prunes, Sultanas, Almonds, Flowers, Citrus

Palate: Apples, Sultanas, Pepper, Dark Chocolate, Raisins, Truffles, Malt, Caramel, Toffee, Tar, Gas, Grilled Meats

Finish: Toffee, Pepper, Raisins, Dark Chocolate, Prunes
